price: To neće biti ni po vašim željama, ni po željama sljedbenika Knjige; onaj koji radi zlo, bit će kažnjen za to i neće naći, mimo Allaha, ni zaštitnika ni pomagača,
arabic: لَّيۡسَ بِأَمَانِيِّكُمۡ وَلَآ أَمَانِيِّ أَهۡلِ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِۗ مَن يَعۡمَلۡ سُوٓءٗا يُجۡزَ بِهِۦ وَلَا يَجِدۡ لَهُۥ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ وَلِيّٗا وَلَا نَصِيرٗا

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: laysa bi-amāniyyikum walā amāniyyi ahli al-kitābi man yaʿmal sūan yuj'za bihi walā yajid lahu min dūni al-lahi waliyyan walā naṣīran
